song.title: Professional tracker
song.info:
Revision 2014 Tracked Music Compo
Put together using a mixture of Cubase, Plugins and ProTracker v2.3D
Lyrics below, why not rap along with Daytripper?
: Chorus Professional tracker Progressive pattern hacker 31 samples of dirty subject matter We got that Amiga Vision You better bring your homework boy Coz this is revision
: Verse Yeah, we got the stank Rocking all night to that pattern skank Digging deep in the sample bank Can't leave nothing Blank Trample the tracks like a battle tank Protracking in our sleep Like androids counting 64 electric sleep You can find us in the demoscene proud and raw Surrounded by Amigas and 64s 1 bit, 2 bit, 3 bit more 7 bit, 8 bit - no more We be making a play With AV projects that are 64k Main aim to win the day Glitch hopping head bobbin' Ragamuffins never stopping Track smashing, noise caching Get the beat cracking One more thing left before you go crackers Shout out to the hackers, graphicians and pro trackers
: Chorus
: Verse Hoffman breaking up the tracks With Daytripper fillin' in the gaps Listen up, here's a fact The demoscene ain't dead It's just you can't read the code Better get it in your head Before the deadline's closed Text to form: The fact of the matter is we'll batter you with stuff made before you were born So listen up before you go crackers... Shout out to the hackers, graphicians and pro trackers
